title: The Best Black Friday Fashion Deals, According to a Shopping Expert
description: Calling all fashion connoisseurs! Black Friday 2024 has finally made its return, bringing with it a bevy of amazing deals that span every top category - from beauty to fitness and yes, even fashion. After nearly three years of working as a shopping editor, I'll admit: few things surprise me, especially when it comes to Black Friday sales. But this year's savings event has managed to shock and delight me (in the best way) with a number of unexpected deals, all from major retailers like Nordstrom, Old Navy, and J.Crew, among others. Searching for a thoughtful gift for the fashion-lover in your life? J.Crew is offering up to 40 percent off on decadent cashmere pieces. In the market for some new running shoes? You'll want to have Nike's Black Friday sale on your radar this weekend. And if you're simply looking for an excuse to refresh your winter closet with some more wardrobe essentials, you can stock up and save on the season's hottest pieces from brands like Reformation or Forever 21 - but only for a limited time. Regardless of what's inspired you to shop this weekend, you're bound to find the perfect holiday gift or treat for yourself. Keep reading to shop my picks for the best Black Friday fashion deals. Looking for something specific? Jump to our specific categories below: Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses Black Friday Fashion Deals on Winter Jackets Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bras and Intimates Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Update on November 29, 2024 at 5:20 p.m. ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Our shopping experts rounded up the best Black Friday fashion sales and deals to shop this week, with savings from brands like Nordstrom, J.Crew, and more.
text: While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Calling all fashion connoisseurs! Black Friday 2024 has finally made its return, bringing with it a bevy of amazing deals that span every top category — from beauty to fitness and yes, even fashion. After nearly three years of working as a shopping editor, I'll admit: few things surprise me, especially when it comes to Black Friday sales. But this year's savings event has managed to shock and delight me (in the best way) with a number of unexpected deals, all from major retailers like Nordstrom, Old Navy, and J.Crew, among others. Searching for a thoughtful gift for the fashion-lover in your life? J.Crew is offering up to 40 percent off on decadent cashmere pieces. In the market for some new running shoes? You'll want to have Nike's Black Friday sale on your radar this weekend. And if you're simply looking for an excuse to refresh your winter closet with some more wardrobe essentials, you can stock up and save on the season's hottest pieces from brands like Reformation or Forever 21 — but only for a limited time. Regardless of what's inspired you to shop this weekend, you're bound to find the perfect holiday gift or treat for yourself. Keep reading to shop my picks for the best Black Friday fashion deals. Looking for something specific? Jump to our specific categories below: Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses Black Friday Fashion Deals on Winter Jackets Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bras and Intimates Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Update on November 29, 2024 at 5:20 p.m. ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBlack Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersApsvo Chunky Gold Hoop Earrings ($9, originally $13) Add a touch of glam to any outfit with these dainty gold earrings from Amazon. The lightweight hoops have over 5,000 ratings on the site, with shoppers raving about everything from their comfortable fit to their luxurious yet affordable appeal. For the full product details, read our review of the Apsvo Gold Hoop Earrings. Editor Quote: "The Apsvo Chunky Gold Hoop Earrings are best for those like me who love gold and silver statement earrings that exude sophistication without breaking the bank. They're versatile and just as suitable for special occasions like weddings as they are for everyday wear, ensuring that you'll get your money's worth." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingamazon.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersCalvin Klein Modern Cotton Unlined Wireless Bralette ($17, originally $30) With an average 4.5 rating and over 29,000 reviews on Amazon, this comfy bralette is a bonafide bestseller. Shoppers love its wireless design, which offers a fit that's akin with a classic sports bra — and still provides plenty of support for a variety of bust sizes. Plus, it's currently marked down at Amazon's Black Friday sale.shop.lululemon.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersLululemon Fleece Everywhere Belt Bag ($39, originally $58) PSA: Lululemon's famous belt bag is on now sale in a handful of fabrics and colorways — but it's bound to sell out fast. The accessory rose to internet fame with its practical interior pockets and sporty design that's so versatile, you can wear it to the gym, airport, and even on a brunch date. One PS editor detailed her love for the belt bag in this review of Lululemon's Everywhere Belt Bag. Editor Quote: "The Lululemon Everywhere Belt Bag is best for those who want a compact, hands-free alternative to a purse. The design lends itself to a casual–cool 'fit that's perfect for people who are always on the go yet want to look chic and stay organized all the while." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingnike.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersNike Air Max Portal Shoes ($78, originally $110) Nike's Black Friday sale is live and (spoiler!) the deals are massive. For a limited time, shoppers can take up to 60 percent off on select styles, including everything from workout shoes — just like these heightened sneakers — to sculpting leggings and more. Plus, you can use the code BFRIDAY to get an extra 30 percent off on your purchase.PS Photography | Kyley WarrenBlack Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersOrolay Thickened Long Down Jacket ($80, originally $150) Shopping out a new coat for the season? Make sure this warm down jacket is on your radar. The winter coat has an insulated design that's sure to help you stay warm in low temperatures, plus it's water- and wind-proof. One PS editor relied on it during a trip to Iceland and documented her experience with the winter jacket in this review of the Orolay Thickened Down Jacket. Editor Quote: "If you're looking for a practical, stylish, and long-lasting jacket that you can trust will be a wardrobe staple for years to come, you can't go wrong with this Orolay jacket. It's designed with all types of travelers and environments in mind, with a fit that's flattering for all body types. I love that it combines the benefits of a windbreaker, rain coat, and winter jacket all into one multifunctional style, while still boasting a relatively accessible price tag." — Kyley Warren, assistant editor, Shoppingamazon.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and SweatersMangopop Square Neck Long Sleeve Bodysuit ($17, originally $36) Despite its classic design, this long-sleeve bodysuit is made to be worn a bunch of different ways. You can style it with jeans or underneath a blazer — the options are truly endless. For extra inspiration, check out our Amazon bodysuits review. Editor Quote: "The elasticity is flawless and makes for the most perfect fit. It's tight and form-fitting but hugs in all the right places. I love the square neckline, and the long sleeves make it the perfect pairing with jeans for fall. This bodysuit looks extremely similar to a bodysuit I've been eyeing that costs over $100, which makes me so happy I stumbled across this one because it's a fraction of the price." — Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social producergap.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and SweatersGap Vintage Soft Raglan Sweatshirt ($19, originally $50) Is it even cozy season without a plush sweatshirt to snuggle up in? I'd argue no, which is precisely why this soft layer is currently in my shopping cart. It has a classic appeal that feels so retro, with a minimalistic design that makes it easy to style with a range of outfits. You can pair the Gap sweatshirt with sweatpants for a lounge-worthy ensemble or create a chic, street-style look with an oversize trench coat paired on top. thereformation.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and SweatersReformation Dana Cashmere Crew Sweater ($126, originally $168) This cashmere sweater screams quiet luxury with its plush composition and decadent red coloring. It's a seasonal piece you can keep in your wardrobe for years to come since it's designed to last. And thanks to Reformation's Black Friday sale, it's marked down, along with hundreds of other winter styles.PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBlack Friday Fashion Deals on BottomsLevi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans ($31, originally $80) Leave it to Levi's to design one of the most comfortable pairs of jeans on the market — with the PS editor seal of approval, no less. Regardless of your preferred jean silhouette, these denim pants have a universally flattering design that works across a range of body types. Our own editor even raved about these Levi's jeans in this review of the Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans. Editor Quote: "Not to sound like a broken record, but what I love most about the Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans is their comfort. They're stretchy, high-waisted, and slightly cropped, landing at the ankle. They're just rigid enough to have structure but soft enough that I look forward to slipping into them at the start of the day. They've become the It girl of my denim collection because they go with everything and are reliably comfortable." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingabercrombie.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on BottomsHigh Rise 90s Relaxed Jean ($40, originally $90) What better way to celebrate Black Friday than with a fresh pair of Abercrombie jeans? The retailer's ongoing savings event is offering shoppers 25 percent off everything, plus free shipping on orders over $99. This denim pant is currently high on my shopping wishlist, as it boasts dozens of rave reviews, all highlighting its universally flattering design, comfortable fit, and fun, light-wash coloring.spanx.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on BottomsSpanx Shape Faux-Leather Leggings ($49, originally $98) Are they leggings? Are they faux-leather pants? These bottoms blur the lines between a casual style and an athletic pant, with a form-fitting design that accentuates every curve while still ensuring you feel comfortable. Score them on sale at Spanx's massive Black Friday event, where shoppers can enjoy the brand's biggest savings of the year.amazon.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on DressesPink Queen Loose Turtleneck Oversize Sweater Dress ($29, originally $44) This oversize sweater dress just screams comfort. The style is crafted from an acrylic material that's thick yet breathable, making it a great transitional piece for those days when the temperatures are fluctuating. Plus, the deep side pockets give it a practical edge.freepeople.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on DressesFree People Farrier Velvet Mini Dress ($64, originally $128) Free People's Black Friday sale has arrived, and for a limited time, shoppers can take 50 percent off select styles — just like this buttery-soft dress. The style is primed for holiday wear with its velvet design and luxe green coloring. Pair it with black tights and knee-high boots for the perfect evening ensemble.forever21.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and CoatsForever 21 Faux Shearling & Leather Jacket ($25, originally $50) Leather coats might have a reputation for being expensive, but this faux-shearling style proves you can tap into the sleek trend without having to break your budget. It has a tailored design that looks flattering across a range of body types, and you can't beat that under-$50 price tag.nordstrom.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and CoatsMango Virgin Wool Blend Coat ($180, originally $300) If you need me, I'll be living in this cozy Mango coat all season long. It's oozes an element of sophistication with the camel coloring and tailored structure, while deep side pockets make it easy to carry your everyday essentials — like a cell phone or card holder. Even better: the layer is crafted from a thick wool material that's designed to keep users feeling warm in even the coldest winter temperatures.oldnavy.gap.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on ShoesOld Navy Double-Strap Faux Leather Mary Jane Flats ($15, originally $30) What better way to add a pop of color to your closet than with a bright pair of glossy, red flats? With these ruby-red beauts, you're bound to garner endless compliments. Plus, unlike other styles, the comfortable flats have a double strap design that ensures they stay on your feet while you're walking.amazon.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on ShoesKoolaburra by UGG Burree Platform Slipper ($65, originally $90) Slip into something a little more comfortable this season, like these bestselling UGG slippers. The shoes have an average 4.0 rating on Amazon, along with dozens of high-praise reviews. One shopper wrote: "These are just as nice as the UGG boots but a lot cheaper! Very comfortable and my feet don't sweat. Definitely recommend."madewell.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on ShoesMadewell The Zane Ankle Boot ($137, originally $228) This Madewell ankle boot has all the makings of a staple winter bootie: it's sleek, fitted with a subtle heel, and boasts endless style appeal. The shoes feature a padded foot bed that's designed to provide long-lasting comfort — even if you're on your feet all day. Shop them on sale at Madewell's massive Black Friday event and take an extra 40 percent off at checkout with the code MADEBETTER.girlfriend.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on Bras and IntimatesGirlfriend Collective Black Cleo Halter Bra ($18, originally $46) Bra shopping doesn't have to feel like a chore so long as you're starting your spree at Girlfriend Collective. The brand is home to hundreds of size-inclusive pieces that are made with all body types and bust sizes in mind. This halter bra is touted as a bestseller, beloved for its casual yet supportive fit. Plus, it's on major sale for Black Friday.victoriassecret.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on Bras and IntimatesVictoria's Secret No-Show Thong Panties Bundle ($17, originally $28) Give your intimates drawer the refresh it deserves at Victoria Secrets's Black Friday sale. For a limited time, enjoy 40 percent off everything, including comfy bras, sultry lingerie, and panty bundles — just like this thong set.jcrew.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on AccessoriesJ.Crew Cashmere Tech Gloves ($33, originally $70) No winter wardrobe is complete with a cozy pair of gloves, and this cashmere accessory is one of my favorites. The winter essential is crafted from a high-quality cashmere material that feels so soft against skin. Its touchscreen-friendly design also makes it easy to use your smartphone while wearing the gloves.saksoff5th.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on AccessoriesUgg Shearling Bucket Hat ($112, originally $160) If you love Ugg slippers, then you're bound to love this cozy bucket hat, which boasts a similar design to its most famous boots — just with a floppier, shearling-lined appeal. Shop it in a chestnut or black coloring, and score it on sale at Saks Fifth Avenue's Black Friday sale. (Use the code BESTDEAL to get an extra 25 percent off on orders over $150.)katespade.comBlack Friday Fashion Deals on AccessoriesKate Spade Bleeker Large Tote ($124, originally $248) Treat yourself to a designer buy that'll become a staple in your wardrobe — just like this Kate Spade tote. The large accessory boasts ample interior space, making it a great everyday bag that you can carry on your commute into the office or on your next date night. Best of all, it's currently on sale at Kate Spade's Black Friday event.Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Calling all fashion connoisseurs! Black Friday 2024 has finally made its return, bringing with it a bevy of amazing deals that span every top category — from beauty to fitness and yes, even fashion. After nearly three years of working as a shopping editor, I'll admit: few things surprise me, especially when it comes to Black Friday sales. But this year's savings event has managed to shock and delight me (in the best way) with a number of unexpected deals, all from major retailers like Nordstrom, Old Navy, and J.Crew, among others.

Searching for a thoughtful gift for the fashion-lover in your life? J.Crew is offering up to 40 percent off on decadent cashmere pieces. In the market for some new running shoes? You'll want to have Nike's Black Friday sale on your radar this weekend. And if you're simply looking for an excuse to refresh your winter closet with some more wardrobe essentials, you can stock up and save on the season's hottest pieces from brands like Reformation or Forever 21 — but only for a limited time.

Regardless of what's inspired you to shop this weekend, you're bound to find the perfect holiday gift or treat for yourself. Keep reading to shop my picks for the best Black Friday fashion deals. Looking for something specific? Jump to our specific categories below:

  • Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers
  • Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters
  • Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms
  • Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses
  • Black Friday Fashion Deals on Winter Jackets
  • Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes
  • Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bras and Intimates
  • Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and
subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations.

Update on November 29, 2024 at 5:20 p.m. ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

Apsvo Chunky Gold Hoop Earrings ($9, originally $13)

Add a touch of glam to any outfit with these dainty gold earrings from Amazon. The lightweight hoops have over 5,000 ratings on the site, with shoppers raving about everything from their comfortable fit to their luxurious yet affordable appeal. For the full product details, read our review of the Apsvo Gold Hoop Earrings.

Editor Quote: "The Apsvo Chunky Gold Hoop Earrings are best for those like me who love gold and silver statement earrings that exude sophistication without breaking the bank. They're versatile and just as suitable for special occasions like weddings as they are for everyday wear, ensuring that you'll get your money's worth." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

Calvin Klein Modern Cotton Unlined Wireless Bralette ($17, originally $30)

With an average 4.5 rating and over 29,000 reviews on Amazon, this comfy bralette is a bonafide bestseller. Shoppers love its wireless design, which offers a fit that's akin with a classic sports bra — and still provides plenty of support for a variety of bust sizes. Plus, it's currently marked down at Amazon's Black Friday sale.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

Lululemon Fleece Everywhere Belt Bag ($39, originally $58)

PSA: Lululemon's famous belt bag is on now sale in a handful of fabrics and colorways — but it's bound to sell out fast. The accessory rose to internet fame with its practical interior pockets and sporty design that's so versatile, you can wear it to the gym, airport, and even on a brunch date. One PS editor detailed her love for the belt bag in this review of Lululemon's Everywhere Belt Bag.

Editor Quote: "The Lululemon Everywhere Belt Bag is best for those who want a compact, hands-free alternative to a purse. The design lends itself to a casual–cool 'fit that's perfect for people who are always on the go yet want to look chic and stay organized all the while." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

Nike Air Max Portal Shoes ($78, originally $110)

Nike's Black Friday sale is live and (spoiler!) the deals are massive. For a limited time, shoppers can take up to 60 percent off on select styles, including everything from workout shoes — just like these heightened sneakers — to sculpting leggings and more. Plus, you can use the code BFRIDAY to get an extra 30 percent off on your purchase.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

Orolay Thickened Long Down Jacket ($80, originally $150)

Shopping out a new coat for the season? Make sure this warm down jacket is on your radar. The winter coat has an insulated design that's sure to help you stay warm in low temperatures, plus it's water- and wind-proof. One PS editor relied on it during a trip to Iceland and documented her experience with the winter jacket in this review of the Orolay Thickened Down Jacket.

Editor Quote: "If you're looking for a practical, stylish, and long-lasting jacket that you can trust will be a wardrobe staple for years to come, you can't go wrong with this Orolay jacket. It's designed with all types of travelers and environments in mind, with a fit that's flattering for all body types. I love that it combines the benefits of a windbreaker, rain coat, and winter jacket all into one multifunctional style, while still boasting a relatively accessible price tag." — Kyley Warren, assistant editor, Shopping

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters

Mangopop Square Neck Long Sleeve Bodysuit ($17, originally $36)

Despite its classic design, this long-sleeve bodysuit is made to be worn a bunch of different ways. You can style it with jeans or underneath a blazer — the options are truly endless. For extra inspiration, check out our Amazon bodysuits review.

Editor Quote: "The elasticity is flawless and makes for the most perfect fit. It's tight and form-fitting but hugs in all the right places. I love the square neckline, and the long sleeves make it the perfect pairing with jeans for fall. This bodysuit looks extremely similar to a bodysuit I've been eyeing that costs over $100, which makes me so happy I stumbled across this one because it's a fraction of the price." — Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social producer

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters

Gap Vintage Soft Raglan Sweatshirt ($19, originally $50)

Is it even cozy season without a plush sweatshirt to snuggle up in? I'd argue no, which is precisely why this soft layer is currently in my shopping cart. It has a classic appeal that feels so retro, with a minimalistic design that makes it easy to style with a range of outfits. You can pair the Gap sweatshirt with sweatpants for a lounge-worthy ensemble or create a chic, street-style look with an oversize trench coat paired on top.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters

Reformation Dana Cashmere Crew Sweater ($126, originally $168)

This cashmere sweater screams quiet luxury with its plush composition and decadent red coloring. It's a seasonal piece you can keep in your wardrobe for years to come since it's designed to last. And thanks to Reformation's Black Friday sale, it's marked down, along with hundreds of other winter styles.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms

Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans ($31, originally $80)

Leave it to Levi's to design one of the most comfortable pairs of jeans on the market — with the PS editor seal of approval, no less. Regardless of your preferred jean silhouette, these denim pants have a universally flattering design that works across a range of body types. Our own editor even raved about these Levi's jeans in this review of the Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans.

Editor Quote: "Not to sound like a broken record, but what I love most about the Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans is their comfort. They're stretchy, high-waisted, and slightly cropped, landing at the ankle. They're just rigid enough to have structure but soft enough that I look forward to slipping into them at the start of the day. They've become the It girl of my denim collection because they go with everything and are reliably comfortable." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms

High Rise 90s Relaxed Jean ($40, originally $90)

What better way to celebrate Black Friday than with a fresh pair of Abercrombie jeans? The retailer's ongoing savings event is offering shoppers 25 percent off everything, plus free shipping on orders over $99. This denim pant is currently high on my shopping wishlist, as it boasts dozens of rave reviews, all highlighting its universally flattering design, comfortable fit, and fun, light-wash coloring.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms

Spanx Shape Faux-Leather Leggings ($49, originally $98)

Are they leggings? Are they faux-leather pants? These bottoms blur the lines between a casual style and an athletic pant, with a form-fitting design that accentuates every curve while still ensuring you feel comfortable. Score them on sale at Spanx's massive Black Friday event, where shoppers can enjoy the brand's biggest savings of the year.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses

Pink Queen Loose Turtleneck Oversize Sweater Dress ($29, originally $44)

This oversize sweater dress just screams comfort. The style is crafted from an acrylic material that's thick yet breathable, making it a great transitional piece for those days when the temperatures are fluctuating. Plus, the deep side pockets give it a practical edge.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses

Free People Farrier Velvet Mini Dress ($64, originally $128)

Free People's Black Friday sale has arrived, and for a limited time, shoppers can take 50 percent off select styles — just like this buttery-soft dress. The style is primed for holiday wear with its velvet design and luxe green coloring. Pair it with black tights and knee-high boots for the perfect evening ensemble.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and Coats

Forever 21 Faux Shearling & Leather Jacket ($25, originally $50)

Leather coats might have a reputation for being expensive, but this faux-shearling style proves you can tap into the sleek trend without having to break your budget. It has a tailored design that looks flattering across a range of body types, and you can't beat that under-$50 price tag.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and Coats

Mango Virgin Wool Blend Coat ($180, originally $300)

If you need me, I'll be living in this cozy Mango coat all season long. It's oozes an element of sophistication with the camel coloring and tailored structure, while deep side pockets make it easy to carry your everyday essentials — like a cell phone or card holder. Even better: the layer is crafted from a thick wool material that's designed to keep users feeling warm in even the coldest winter temperatures.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes

Old Navy Double-Strap Faux Leather Mary Jane Flats ($15, originally $30)

What better way to add a pop of color to your closet than with a bright pair of glossy, red flats? With these ruby-red beauts, you're bound to garner endless compliments. Plus, unlike other styles, the comfortable flats have a double strap design that ensures they stay on your feet while you're walking.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes

Koolaburra by UGG Burree Platform Slipper ($65, originally $90)

Slip into something a little more comfortable this season, like these bestselling UGG slippers. The shoes have an average 4.0 rating on Amazon, along with dozens of high-praise reviews. One shopper wrote: "These are just as nice as the UGG boots but a lot cheaper! Very comfortable and my feet don't sweat. Definitely recommend."

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes

Madewell The Zane Ankle Boot ($137, originally $228)

This Madewell ankle boot has all the makings of a staple winter bootie: it's sleek, fitted with a subtle heel, and boasts endless style appeal. The shoes feature a padded foot bed that's designed to provide long-lasting comfort — even if you're on your feet all day. Shop them on sale at Madewell's massive Black Friday event and take an extra 40 percent off at checkout with the code MADEBETTER.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bras and Intimates

Girlfriend Collective Black Cleo Halter Bra ($18, originally $46)

Bra shopping doesn't have to feel like a chore so long as you're starting your spree at Girlfriend Collective. The brand is home to hundreds of size-inclusive pieces that are made with all body types and bust sizes in mind. This halter bra is touted as a bestseller, beloved for its casual yet supportive fit. Plus, it's on major sale for Black Friday.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bras and Intimates

Victoria's Secret No-Show Thong Panties Bundle ($17, originally $28)

Give your intimates drawer the refresh it deserves at Victoria Secrets's Black Friday sale. For a limited time, enjoy 40 percent off everything, including comfy bras, sultry lingerie, and panty bundles — just like this thong set.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

J.Crew Cashmere Tech Gloves ($33, originally $70)

No winter wardrobe is complete with a cozy pair of gloves, and this cashmere accessory is one of my favorites. The winter essential is crafted from a high-quality cashmere material that feels so soft against skin. Its touchscreen-friendly design also makes it easy to use your smartphone while wearing the gloves.

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

Ugg Shearling Bucket Hat ($112, originally $160)

If you love Ugg slippers, then you're bound to love this cozy bucket hat, which boasts a similar design to its most famous boots — just with a floppier, shearling-lined appeal. Shop it in a chestnut or black coloring, and score it on sale at Saks Fifth Avenue's Black Friday sale. (Use the code BESTDEAL to get an extra 25 percent off on orders over $150.)

Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

Kate Spade Bleeker Large Tote ($124, originally $248)

Treat yourself to a designer buy that'll become a staple in your wardrobe — just like this Kate Spade tote. The large accessory boasts ample interior space, making it a great everyday bag that you can carry on your commute into the office or on your next date night. Best of all, it's currently on sale at Kate Spade's Black Friday event.

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
